attributes.action: Reinstate the Death Penalty in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
We ask that Hanging be reinstated for the following crimes :

1st degree Murder
Acts of Terrorism 
Rape of a child
attributes.background:
The laws in the UK need to change ! Crimes against humanity have just got out of hand. 
Criminals have no respect for the law or value human life, and it's time the punishment fits the crime . Those that are prepared to brutally murder another human being then they should face the hangmans noose !
